location.sjis: ディックル村 釣り人の池

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: 武器を取りに来たのか？
portrait_l.ascii: Did you come to pick up your weapon?

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: 武器を預けに来たのか？
portrait_l.ascii: Are you dropping off your weapon here?

portrait_l.name: man
portrait_l.sjis: 預けられそうな武器が無いぞ
portrait_l.ascii: You have no weapons that can be dropped off.

portrait_l.name: woman
portrait_l.sjis: ひとり物思いにふける女って 絵にならない？
portrait_l.ascii: A lone woman lost in her thoughts. Doesn't that make the perfect picture?
